data.text: @Typ0negative @JadeKhalife They're worse off now than before the vaccines because they're fully re-open. Try to keep up.

@ProfPHansen @JadeKhalife death from ICU is a small fraction - not a good proxy. The dead of in the 30-60 tail is a small fraction but could still be significant. Fitting a convolution kernel to map infection numbers to dead shows that death from omicron starts at day 20 and keeps growing to day 30
@JadeKhalife @DrLeibl Einfach zynisch, die PolitikerInnen, die entschieden haben, dass dies so passieren soll.
@JadeKhalife @itosettiMD_MBA I thought Sweden was the bad guy?
@JadeKhalife @truthshamesthe6 well, you know what they say about blondes...

@ProfPHansen @LarsRisbo Also, just as we over-include incidentals, we also miss deaths post-30-days but w/in 60days.

We also are excluding longer-term deaths, which will be quite large. e.g. https://t.co/zzkqHxSqrA 

Also excluding LongCovid, chronic dis. due to Covid.
Altogether, bad direction.  /4 https://t.co/9uqpstMcXB

@ProfPHansen @LarsRisbo The 170 deaths 'expected' this period is likely due to mainly influenza, then RSV. But historical low now:
https://t.co/6ILu5wmzHx 
So Covid is 'stepping in' for them.

Excess mortality indicator useful, but has limitations; can wrongly assume baseline is unchanged. /2 https://t.co/ITHg6A4fd9
